item.title: High Performance Browser Networking
item.description: Ch01. Primer on Latency and Bandwidth Latency The time from the source sending a packet to the destination receiving it Bandwidth Maximum throughput of a logical or physical communication path Latency, not bandwidth, is the performance bottleneck for most web‚Äê sites! To increase bandwidth, while it might not be cheap, we have multiple strategies available, like adding more fiber links. Improving latency, on the other hand, is a very different story.
